com.robopupu.api.util

Class PermissionRequestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robopupu.api.dependency.ScopedObject
      • com.robopupu.api.plugin.AbstractPluginComponent
        • com.robopupu.api.component.AbstractManager
          • com.robopupu.api.util.PermissionRequestManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Manager, Scopeable, PluginComponent

    public class PermissionRequestManager
extends AbstractManager
    PermissionRequestManager provides an abstract base class for implementing a manager for requesting permissions using PermissionRequests.

    • Method Detail

      • createRequest

        public PermissionRequest createRequest(android.app.Activity activity,
                                       java.lang.String permission,
                                       PermissionRequest.Callback callback)
        Create an instance of PermissionRequest for requesting the specified user permission.
        Parameters:
        activity - An Activity needed for ActivityCompat#requestPermissions(Activity, String[], int). May not be null.
        permission - A String specifying the requested permission. May not be null.
        callback - A PermissionRequest.Callback provided by the permission requester. May not be null.
        Returns:
        A PermissionRequest.

      • commitRequest

        public PermissionRequest commitRequest(android.app.Activity activity,
                                       java.lang.String permission,
                                       PermissionRequest.Callback callback)
        Create an instance of PermissionRequest for requesting the specified user permission. The created instance is committed by invoking PermissionRequest.commit().
        Parameters:
        activity - An Activity needed for ActivityCompat#requestPermissions(Activity, String[], int). May not be null.
        permission - A String specifying the requested permission. May not be null.
        callback - A PermissionRequest.Callback provided by the permission requester. May not be null.
        Returns:
        A PermissionRequest.

      • isPermissionGranted

        public static boolean isPermissionGranted(android.content.Context context,
                                          java.lang.String permission)
        Test if the specific user permission has been already granted.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        permission - A String specifying the requested permission. May not be null.
        Returns:
        A boolean value.

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                       java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                       int[] grantResults)

      • hasPendingRequests

        public boolean hasPendingRequests()
        Test if there any pending PermissionRequests.
        Returns:
        A boolean value.

      • clearPendingRequests

        public boolean clearPendingRequests()
        Clear all pending PermissionRequests if any.
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating if there were any pending PermissionRequests.
